title: Sliding piece (Cerberus)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sliding pieces are the individual pieces that can be seen in a Puzzle box. The pieces themselves are actually items, although they can only be seen in the puzzle box interface and can never be obtained by players.

Sliding pieces are the individual pieces that can be seen in a Puzzle box. The pieces themselves are actually items, although they can only be seen in the puzzle box interface and can never be obtained by players.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 January 2018
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Sliding piece" to an entirely blank name.
  • The item's examine was changed from "A piece of the puzzle" to an entirely blank examine.
  • The "Move" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.

'''Sliding pieces''' are the individual pieces that can be seen in a [[Puzzle box]]. The pieces themselves are actually items, although they can only be seen in the puzzle box interface and can never be obtained by players.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 11 January 2018
|update = The Return of Galvek
|change =
*The item was renamed from "Sliding piece" to an entirely blank name.
*The item's examine was changed from "A piece of the puzzle" to an entirely blank examine.
*The "Move" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}
